column2: BRIEF-Oppenheimer Expands Global Technology Media And Communications Investment Banking Franchise April 25 (Reuters) - Oppenheimer Holdings Inc: * OPPENHEIMER EXPANDS ITS GLOBAL TECHNOLOGY MEDIA AND COMMUNICATIONS INVESTMENT BANKING FRANCHISE * OPPENHEIMER HOLDINGS ANNOUNCES APPOINTMENT OF RAMON DE PAZ AS A MANAGING DIRECTOR IN GLOBAL TECHNOLOGY, MEDIA AND COMMUNICATIONS INVESTMENT BANKING GROUP Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
